Params: {3: 'The emotionless voice resonates within the confines of the small room, initiating a routine conversation that unfolds every night.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haniff', 3: 'I left at 16:00, arrived at the shopping street at 16:12 and bought a serving of grilled artificial meat there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: 'I arrived at the Dominik Memorial Plaza at 16:42, stayed there for some time, and returned at 17:00.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "This week, you've been going to the Dominik Memorial Plaza every day during your break. What's the reason?"}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: 'Just want to pick a good spot for myself on that monument.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haniff raises his hand in a gesture of surrender toward the camera.'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: "It's a job with a very high mortality rate. Didn't you explicitly acknowledge that in the contract?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: 'I just want to confirm it for myself. Where are you going to put me after graduation?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: 'The Task Force? The Purifying Force? Or your secret force?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "It's not for you to decide. Do not pry into matters you shouldn't."}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: "If there's an option, I'd prefer to join the Task Force.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As if not hearing the voice's warning, Haniff continues to talk."}
{2: 'Haniff', 3: 'At the very least... I can leave behind my name to be remembered.', 4: '1'}
